category.name: Data Sharing.STEP Translator
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: STEP_default_datasettype
preference.preference_description: Supports only STEP AP214. Used to retrieve the default dataset type name when it cannot be obtained from the Teamcenter database via the dataset tool tag or inferred from the file extension. Valid Values: One or more strings; each string must be a valid Teamcenter dataset type name.
